comment.author: 25053835@N03
comment._content: We're looking for your help! Please help us identify the location in this photograph in the comments below.

comment.author: 57668330@N00
comment._content: Wisteria House on the NW corner of Massachusetts Avenue and Eleventh Street, NW (razed 1924). See pg. 62 of the 2nd ed. of James Goode's Capital Losses.

comment.author: 25053835@N03
comment._content:
The title has been updated! 

Susannah
Smithsonian Institution Archives

comment.author: 57668330@N00
comment._content: Would love to take a crack at IDing other D.C. photos from your collection that need it :)

comment.author: 25053835@N03
comment._content:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/rock_creek] Thanks for your enthusiasm, rockcreek!  
I presented the idea to our supervisory archivist. It's seems all the remaining images in this collection are clearly identified, but we'll see what we can do for ya! We enjoy similar projects, as well. 

All best, 

Susannah
Smithsonian Institution Archives
